SEARCH
Package Server.Network.Lobby

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Server.Network.Lobby.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
LobbyInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class Lobby extends UnicastRemoteObject implements LobbyInterface
The Lobby class represents the lobby system in the game server. It manages player login, logout, lobby sizes, game initialization, and provides lobby information.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby() throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new instance of the Lobby class. Initializes the lobby, heartbeat, lobby size, and games.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote method call

  • Method Details

    • getLobbyInfo

      public void getLobbyInfo(RemoteView remote) throws RemoteException
      Sends the lobby information to the specified remote view.
      Specified by:
      getLobbyInfo in interface LobbyInterface
      Parameters:
      remote - the remote view to which the lobby information will be sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote method call

    • getLobbyInfo

      public List<Map<String,String>> getLobbyInfo()
      Retrieves the lobby information as a list of maps containing lobby and game details.
      Returns:
      a list of maps representing the lobby information. Each map contains lobby ID and player count, and game name and active player count.

    • login

      public void login(String playerID, String lobbyID, RemoteView client, RemoteClient network) throws RemoteException
      Handles the login process for a player.
      Specified by:
      login in interface LobbyInterface
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player logging in
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby in which the player is logging in
      client - the remote view of the player
      network - the remote client representing the player's network connection
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote method call

      Sets the lobby size for the specified lobby.
      Specified by:
      setLobbySize in interface LobbyInterface
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player requesting the lobby size change
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby for which to set the size
      lobbySize - the desired lobby size to set

      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote method call
